org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.modifiers
Interface BasicModifier

All Known Subinterfaces:
BasicGenericDao, CompleteGenericDao, GeneralGenericDao, GenericDao
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseBasicGenericDao, BaseGeneralGenericDao, BaseGenericDao, HibernateBasicGenericDao, HibernateCompleteGenericDao, HibernateGeneralGenericDao, HibernateGenericDao, JdbcBasicGenericDao, JdbcGeneralGenericDao, JdbcGenericDao
public interface BasicModifier

This Modifier provides methods to modify single persistent entities, this modifier should be used in even the simplest DAO

Author:
Aaron Zeckoski (aaronz@vt.edu)

Method Summary
 void create(Object object)
          Create the object and assign it an id, if the object already has an id then it will be created using that id, if there is no id then one will be assigned to it
<T> boolean
delete(Class<T> entityClass, Serializable id)
          Deletes the object represented by this id
 void delete(Object object)
          Deletes the object and transforms it from persistent to transient
 void save(Object object)
          Saves the object and transforms it into a persistent object if it is not already one and assigns it an id, if is already persistent then the object is updated
 void update(Object object)
          Updates the object (object must already exist in persistent storage)
 

Method Detail

create

void create(Object object)
Create the object and assign it an id, if the object already has an id then it will be created using that id, if there is no id then one will be assigned to it

Parameters:
object - the persistent type object to save (hibernate version must have associated hbm file)
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the object already exists or the id is already used

update

void update(Object object)
Updates the object (object must already exist in persistent storage)

Parameters:
object - the persistent type object to save (hibernate version must have associated hbm file)
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the object does not exist or the id is null

save

void save(Object object)
Saves the object and transforms it into a persistent object if it is not already one and assigns it an id, if is already persistent then the object is updated

Parameters:
object - the persistent type object to save (must have associated hbm file)

delete

void delete(Object object)
Deletes the object and transforms it from persistent to transient

Parameters:
object - the java object to delete (must have associated hbm file)
Throws:
RuntimeException - if the object cannot be deleted
See Also:
delete(Class, Serializable)

delete

<T> boolean delete(Class<T> entityClass,
                   Serializable id)
Deletes the object represented by this id

Parameters:
entityClass - class type of the persistent object
id - the identifier of the object to delete
Returns:
true if object deleted, false otherwise
